title: Tokimeki no Ikenie
sinopse:
"Is this a dream? Or a miracle?"

A plain and inconspicuous girl, Mari Jingyouji, was confessed to by Shigeru Hanamizuki, the most popular boy in the class, after she saved him from dying in a car accident. But there is a reason why Mari is not happy with this. That's because, her family are all "○○○"...

(Source: Kodansha, translated)
